summary: The diff updates the app to only show a password *verification* modal when a user already has a registered password and is not yet verified in-session, and it gates authenticated navigation/actions accordingly. It also removes/avoids any apparent password *registration* (“Create Your Password”) step in the shown code paths. However, the diff also includes documentation/summaries describing unrelated Google/Apple sign-in UI changes that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: User-facing Google/Apple sign-in options shown on Landing and Submit pages for unauthenticated users.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly focuses on removing the password registration step and preserving conditional password verification; it does not request adding/changing login providers or UI to show Google/Apple sign-in options.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (truncated) — mentions LandingPage displaying Google/Apple sign-in options and SubmitComplaintPage showing an alert with Google/Apple sign-in options
